mapper.select: SELECT PRO_NO, PROCATEGORY_NO, PRO_NAME, PRO_DETAIL, PRO_PRICE, PRO_DELETED, IS_PRODUCT FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRO_DELETED = 'N' AND IS_PRODUCT ='Y'
SELECT pro_no, procategory_no, pro_name, pro_detail, pro_price, pro_deleted, is_product, CHANGE_NAME FROM product JOIN ATTACHMENT USING(PRO_NO) WHERE pro_deleted = 'N' AND IS_PRODUCT ='Y'
SELECT CHANGE_NAME FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE PRO_NO = #{productNo}
SELECT m.PRO_NO AS PRO_NO, m.PRO_NAME AS PRO_NAME, r.AMOUNT AS AMOUNT FROM RECIPE r JOIN PRODUCT m ON r.MAT_NO = m.PRO_NO WHERE r.PRO_NO = #{productNo}
